text: Calogero Lorenzo "Chazz" Palminteri (born May 15, 1952)Chazz Palminteri bio . Chazzpalminteri.net. Retrieved on November 19, 2013. is an American actor, screenwriter, producer and playwright. He is best known for his Academy Award-nominated role for Best Supporting Actor in Bullets over Broadway.
